Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
16.08.2013 SH SCR18340 Added update DUNL_COUT_LINENO = COUT_LINENO
03.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
04.07.2012 GB SCR17285 Fixed problem with deletion MQ 11 and store IMQD per selected CSEC row in the Step3
11.05.2012 GB SCR17285 Moved the Part 3 to the separate task
07.05.2012 GB SCR17285 Added the parts Cleanup MQ 11, Step 3 - Inform the client via Creditview - moved the Step 3 to the end
part If V.DATE <= GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE ...
28.12.2010 GB SCR16103 Extended condition for the first selection (CSEC)
02.12.2009 SH SCR15126 Step 2 Changed update REPA_HIDEONWEBSITEto 'N'
07.10.2009 GB SCR14975 Changed condition for set the V.DATE
-- Cleanup MQ 11

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CSEC_ADMNO, CSEC_CLNTNO, CSEC_SECNO, CSEC701_TYPE, CSEC701_EXPIRY from :1/CSEC, :1/CLNT where CLNT101_ADMNO = CSEC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CSEC_CLNTNO and exists (select * from :1/CSDT where CSDT_CSCC_TYPE = CSEC701_TYPE) and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 order by CSEC_ADMNO, CSEC_CLNTNO, CSEC_SECNO for fetch only

select CCDU302_LETTER, CCDU302_COUNTRY, CCDU302_DDAYS, CCDU302_CODE from :1/CSDT join :1/CCDU on CCDU302_ADMNO = :2 and CCDU302_CLNTNO = :3 and CCDU302_COUNTRY = ':5' and CCDU302_LETTER = CSDT_DULD_LETTER where CSDT_CSCC_TYPE = :4 order by CCDU302_LETTER for fetch only

Text.val: ... days after due date
... days before due date
-- Send new dunning letter
-- the condition CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 is in DB SQL
-- the condition not(CSEC701_EXPIRY is null) is in DB SQL

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CCDU302_ADMNO, CCDU302_CLNTNO, CCDU302_CODE , CCDU302_DDAYS from :1/CCDU, :1/CSDT where CCDU302_ADMNO = :2 and CCDU302_CLNTNO = :3 and CSDT_CSCC_TYPE = :4 and CCDU302_LETTER = CSDT_DULD_LETTER and CCDU302_COUNTRY = ':5' for fetch only

Text.val: -- if CCDU302_CODE = 5 (days after expiry date) then set V.DATE = CSEC701_EXPIRY + CCDU302_DDAYS
-- if CCDU302_CODE = 6 (days before expiry date) then set V.DATE = CSEC701_EXPIRY - CCDU302_DDAYS
-- if V.DATE <= GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
